text: ��[it is] for everyone who is oft-returning (awwāb), heedful (ḥafīẓ) of God�� He said:He is the one who turns back with his heart from evil suggestions to tranquil reliance (sukūn) on God, Exalted is He, and is the heedful one (ḥafīẓ), who guards his moments (awqāt) and states (aḥwāl), [while] keeping to His commandments and observing acts of obedience.Ibn ʿAyniyya said, �The one who is oft-returning, heedful of God is the person who does not get up from a gathering until he has asked for God�s forgiveness for it, regardless of whether it was good or bad, due to the imperfection and deficiency that he sees in it.� His words, Exalted is He:
